mapper.insert: insert into article_group (title, create_time, update_time, icon_id, lgg_id) values (#{title}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{iconId}, #{lggId});
mapper.select: select article_group.*, l.* from article_group inner join language l on article_group.lgg_id = l.lgg_id order by article_group.create_time desc

select article_group.*, a.article_id, a.title a_title, a.create_time a_c_time, a.update_time a_u_time, a.article_state from article_group left join article a on article_group.article_group_id = a.group_id where article_group.article_group_id = #{articleGroupId}
select * from article where group_id=#{articleGroupId} limit 0,1;
